item.title: ‘Improved’ Grok criticizes Democrats and Hollywood’s ‘Jewish executives’
item.description: On Friday morning, Elon Musk declared, “We have improved @Grok significantly. You should notice a difference when you ask Grok questions.”

item.title: At least 36 new tech unicorns were minted in 2025 so far
item.description: With AI igniting an investor frenzy, every month, more startups obtain unicorn status. Using data from Crunchbase and PitchBook, TechCrunch tracked do...

item.title: X blocked Reuters accounts in India
item.description: The main Reuters news account, as well as the Reuters World account, have apparently been inaccessible to X users in India since Saturday evening.

item.title: Researchers seek to influence peer review with hidden AI prompts

item.title: How Brex is keeping up with AI by embracing the ‘messiness’
item.description: Brex quickly realized its normal software procurement process wouldn't work in the age of AI and found a new way to test and vet tools.
